participant_1.background:
I want to get a bagel with everything on it before I start my shift.
I love nature and my garden is a big part of that.
i have not gone home in over two years.
I've lost a lot of things in my life, but losing my diamond at the debutante ball was by far the most difficult.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.

participant_2.background:
I'm always spilling drinks on myself at the beach, but I love it anyway.
i write in my spare time.
i like to build things.
wedding cakes are my specialty.
i m a veteran.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love building things in my spare time. I like to make things out of wood or metal.
That's really cool! Have you ever built anything really big?
I built a huge deck on my house last summer. It was a lot of work, but it was really worth it.
Wow, that's awesome! I'm not very good at building things.
It's not too hard to learn. There are a lot of good books and videos out there.
Maybe I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's really rewarding to make something with your own hands.
I think I would like that.
What's your favorite thing to do outdoors?
I love to garden. I have a big garden in my backyard and I love to grow my own vegetables.
That's so cool! I wish I had a green thumb. I always kill my plants.
It's not that hard. Just give them plenty of water and sun and they'll be fine.
I'll have to try that.
You should! It's really rewarding to grow your own food.
I'll definitely give it a try.
Good! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I'm excited to try it.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great day!
You too! Have a good weekend!
